Workshop and School

Structured Regularization for High-Dimensional Data Analysis

Welcome to the mathematical workshop and graduate school “Structured Regularization for High-Dimensional Data Analysis”.

Where and when

The conference will take place from June 19th to 23rd in Institut Henri Poincaré, in Paris, France.

Organizers
